content: Miles, it's your dad. Please open the door. Miles, I can see your shadow moving around. Yeah, okay, I get it. I get it. You're still ignoring me. Look, can we talk for a minute? Something happened to... Look, sometimes people drift apart, Miles. And I don't want that to happen to us, okay? Look, I know I don't always do what you need me to do, or say what you need me to say, but I see this spark in you. It's amazing. It's why I push you. But it's yours, and whatever you choose to do with it, you'll be great. Look, call me when you can. Okay? I love you. You don't have to say it back though.
author: Bob Persichetti, Peter Ramsey, Rodney Rothman
